content.detailedDescription:
My girlfriend and i were on our way home from the mall a couple of nights ago. we were laughing and singing along with the radio. i looked up into the sky and i saw a strange orange light. i felt almost hypnotized by it, then it disappeared. immediately i told myself that it was only a glare from a passing vehicle. as i was turning to ask my girlfriend if she saw anything. she was actually turning to ask me the same thing. so was a loud, simultaneous, "did you see that!!?"
now skeptical, but still thinking logical, i assumed it was a cloud passing over a bright star. or even a planet. that's when i looked and about 3/4 mile northwest of the initial observation. i saw another one and then another right next to it. each time one appeared... one disappeared in a timed sequence, and in a perfect, counter clockwise circular motion.Hovering, and like a domino effect. now intrigued, i frantically rolled down my window despite the cold winter air. just when i thought it was gone another sequence would appear. each time it appeared to multiply or pulsate, and always in a perfect sequence. there were never more than three lights in each one. i saw a total of three individual sequences on the way home, (like a 5 minute time period). 
when we got back to the house my girlfriend was trying to convince me that it was probably a helicopter or something. it wasn���t. 
so now we're standing in the driveway waiting on these things to show up again. it didn���t take long for them to appear. this time there are 2 sequences in the sky at once about a mile apart from each other, (she no longer thinks its a helicopter), and we can barely see super small twinkling lights in between each pulse. i also noticed that there were suddenly several of the small twinkling lights all over the western sky, moving in random directions. some fast some slow. some times disappearing/appearing. i noticed a low distant rumbling during the sequences. like an engine, or explosion, or breaking barrier. every dog in the neighborhood was barking. just as fast as the show started, it ended. 
i personally cant think of a logical explanation. fireworks? in the winter, with no sound, and in 2 different parts of the western sky... doubt it. maybe a flare? why? and how so timed in 2 different areas? could be a hoax... but someone would have to have a lot of time on there hands because i did some research on this today. i discovered several, damn near, to the "t", same observation as me. not only that, they were in different years and in different locations. something else i noticed in my findings is these sightings almost always occur in the western sky.
content.summary: Orange/amber colred pulsating lights

content.detailedDescription: I stepped out of my apartment to have a cigarette, it was cold.  i glanced at the sky as i do frequently and saw a glowing object that was moving.  it was not a clear night, there was a dull grey cloud covering. the object did not move erratically, no flashing lights no associated anomalies just a glow which i observed for less than a minute until i lost it behind a mass of clouds or it disappeared on its own. it was not a satelitte or the space station.  i would have reported it sooner but have been offline until recently.  this was the first time i had seen anything that i could not identify or reason away. i was of course enthralled and promptly phoned a friend of mine who is ex military and a pilot, described the event to him and he was skeptical but receptive.  it was a startling event being the first time i personally had experienced anything solid. vivid dreams are compelling but just that, dreams. this was really there.
content.summary: Glowing object, moved across the sky south to north.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home at night...Coming down my facing street before turning into my driveway and up in the trees was an amber glowing triangle (it was almost the color of my street light but more amber) the bottom had what appeared as round disk lights about nine(9)that seem brighter than the rest of the body it also had 3 rounded corners not sharp as the pictures i have seen... it had substance as the sides seemed to curve around upward making it 3d not flat looking. i could not tell if it was moving or not as i was driving and trying pay more attention to that..Tho i had not far to go to my driveway but when i turned into my driveway it was then to high and on my right side where the car roof blocked it and i was scared to stop and get out.I have looked again at night from the same vantage point and have seen it or any lights that i could mistaken it for. i had not had any drinks or drugs that could impair my sight of what i saw. i have not until now except my husband told anyone of this as i do not want to be called a nut etc.
but after what i saw...I am really nervous now...I know what i saw it does not comply with what others have said except for the triangle part.
can someone give me an answer as to what it might have been and no i do not think it was one of ours.
content.summary: Glowing amber triangle

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were driving from durango, colorado to aztec, new mexico on sunday, march 9, 2008.  we both knew that san juan county, nm has been a hotbed for ufo activity.  as we were returning to durango northbound on us highway 550 between aztec and the new mexico-colorado border, we were listening to my friend's mp3 player in the car.  all of a sudden, we heard a "whump whump whump" sound that persisted for approximately five minutes.  we determined that the problem was not with the speakers or the integrity of the mp3 files, as everything worked just fine after about five minutes.  we did not see any objects in the sky, though the type of interference led us to suspect ufo activity in the area.  while it is possible that this did not occur from ufo activity, it was certainly some unexplained interference.
content.summary: Unknown audio interference

content.detailedDescription: Late november/early december 2007. white oak, tx.  it was a thursday, but i do not remember the exact date.  i walked outside of my workplace and looked toward the west/southwest and noticed what looked to be a weird orange/yellow cloud.  it was some distance away i could not determine. it didn't appear to move.  i thought the moon was playing tricks on the clouds until i actually saw the moon at another position in the sky.  i continued to watch for approximately 1 min.  it seemed as if it was a plane exploding with the fuel causing a huge fire.  i saw the silhouette of what appeared to be debris shooting out of the flame just before it dissappeared.  an hour later or so, i heard what appeared to be numerous helecoptors.  i searched the media but came up with no plane crash/missing flights that were reported.  i saw the stephenville ufo in the media and did some research.  i'm approximately 200 miles away from stephenville. in the same direction i saw the explosion.  perhaps something crashed and they came to find it?
content.summary: Fireball in sky, like explosion.  debri falling to earth.  direction of stephenville from where i saw it.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at work walking out the back door of the lab and i heard geese honking close over head. i looked up to see them. they looked confused and were having trouble getting the "v" formation going, it looked like they were really honking loud and headed north. i smiled at the confusion of the birds trying to get in formation. something bright & shiny above the birds a few hundred feet above them caught my eye. the sun was just coming up and the sun made the object bright. i freaked i couldn't hardly believe what i was seeing, i just froze and kept looking at it. the birds and the object were low, maybe 800 feet in the air the geese were flying just ahead of the object. 
the object didn't seem to move and no noise came from the craft, it was cylinder in shape with 4 big windows round & shiny, like mirror's, and almost the full lenght of the craft and almost as tall. i guess the lenght to be about 60 - 80 feet long and around 18-20 feet tall.The windows were round & bright and shiny but the craft was a more duller gray metalic color with both ends kinda round. no lights that i could see anywhere on the craft. pretty smooth no seams, except the window were kinda strange and looked more like orb's.
after watching it for about a minute i ran inside to tell my friend to come outside. i didn't tell him what i saw i just said come outside, he was on the phone and didn't come outside for over 3-4 minutes. i wanted someone else to see what i was seeing. this took less that 20 seconds then i ran back outside and nothing...No geese no craft nothing.  my friend came out and i told him what i saw. we looked everywhere, no geese no craft, nothing.
he said he believed me...I guess my expression and my tone of voice convinced him. i took off in the truck and headed north but i couldn't find it again.
we both said that maybe we should just keep it between ourselves, because who would believe us.
i called my wife and told her and she believed me and said who knows whats up there. she knows i don't lie.
what ever it was it look like they were interested in the geese. i should at least of seen the geese but they were gone too.
well thats about it. i've worked at the plant for more that 27 years and once i saw the space shuttle past by coming in for a landing heading      towards it's landing spot. that was cool but this craft was way too cool and i'll never forget what i saw. every dimension is an estimation as close as i could remember.
if you have any questions, you can call me. but i would like it to stay confidential, at least my name.
thanks for your time.
kind regards,
content.summary: I heard geese honking i looked up and above the geese was an unknown object.

content.detailedDescription:
I was filming some b-roll for a documentary about the portland head light in cape elizabeth, maine. i did not notice this object while filming, and just got around to editing the tape it was on until a couple of weeks ago.

i was panning the harbor after shooting a tanker and tugs coming into the harbor, and shot the island forts for the doc we were working on. i didn't pay much attention to it the first few times of going through the film as planes frequently fly in that area to land and take off at the portland airport.

while doing a frame by frame i noticed that this did not appear to be an airplane. i've looked it over several times but cannot determine what type of craft this is. 

the camera i was using had vhsc for media.You'll notice that the object was flying over one of the forts i hesitated at to get the short footage for.
content.summary: Noticed on some video i took, did not notice it while filming

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching the moon in the west for physical science class in clinton jr. college. i was standing in my backyard of the house i grew up in and was 19. the two year electronics course didn't start a new class until the fall of 66. out of the corner of my left eye i saw a group of lights. i turned to look at them and they were headed north towards me from the south. one was a little faster and stopped overhead then the others stopped with it. i am not sure how long they stopped as i just stood there with my mouth hanging open.  i had a polaroid land camera with 3000 speed film in my hands and never thought to use it. they then continued north and about 45 degrees above the horizon they curved up towards space. 
i read about ufos but never thought i would see any. they were a dime at arm's length. i reported it to nicap but said a nickel which was a little too big. they appeared solid and no stars were visible through them.
i also reported to the clinton herald newspapewr in hopes it would bring out other witnesses but no go.
content.summary: Group of about ten ufos

content.detailedDescription: Was taking pictures of airplanes and saw this black object behind the plane and was able to get both in one photo. for more photos and sightings in eastern north carolina go to  http://www.Encghosthunters.Com/index.Html
content.summary: Unown object following airplane

content.detailedDescription: Awoke at 6:30am.Walked into the bathroom.As i was standing there i always look out the window as it faces off to the west.I seen this egg shape diamond like thing off in the distance that caught my eye.At first i thought it was just a plane on aproach to reno international.As that is a landing path route.This was further out as i looked around.As i watched it,i noticed it was spinning and moving up,down,side to side.But was stationary to that area.At this point i used my thumb as a referance to the size of it.As i was holding my thumb up to size it,it was at this point i seen somthing like a bright white dot shoot out of it and off to the west.I made mental note,at that point again about 10seconds later another dot shot out to the south.I wanted to get a better view of this so i went back to my bedroom window to locate the object but it was gone.I only seen a plane on aproach from the south.This siting lasted about 5min 10 sec.
content.summary: Egg shape diamond reflective spinning shooting out a white dot every 10 sec in different directions

content.detailedDescription: Went out on my back patio with my husband.We were just getting done unpacking for the night,we looked up at all the stars and noticed that one was blue and moving... i got pretty worried and watched for only a few minutes. the object seemed to be moving like a balloon but when it did we could see light trailing behind it.It was trying to stay in the same place but would move about every 10-15 seconds or so.Then the movement got more jerky after we had watched it for a few more minutes.Then we got even more concerned and come in doors. we live on camp pendleton and can't hear it make any noise at all.We know what a air plane and a helicopter sounds like.This had no noise at all.
content.summary: Blue like star but keeps moving around in the same area.

content.detailedDescription: I was in the 8th grade. i was just down the street from my home at my cousin's house. her parents were out for the evening. i was working on my math homework while my cousin tami was in the kitchen talking on the phone. i saw her look out the kitchen window into the baseball field that was located directly across the street. she continued into the dining room looking out the windows. i asked her what she was looking at and she didn't reply, she just headed out the front door. i followed. we stood on the corner of the street, along with a handful of neighbors. just above the tree tops, above the baseball field, hovering motionless (as if it were suspended in mid air) there was a huge yellow fluorescent(glowing) disc (typical saucer shape) with a dome (bubble) in the center. it had multi colored lights around the base (green, blue, red), traveling in a chase motion. there was no sound or exhaust coming from this object at all. i looked for windows or doors of any kind and i didn't see anything. it looked like it was going to land in the middle of the baseball field, it was that close! we all stood there in disbelief for what seemed to be at least 2-3 minutes. we all instinctively knew it wasn't something from this planet. i asked, "what is it"? a neighbor replied, "hell if i know"! just as he said that, in a split second, this object shot straight up into the sky and then shot across the sky in an easterly direction. it was gone! the neighbor jumped in his car as if to try and follow it. my cousin and i ran back into her house to call her parents. the phones would not work. tami started to cry. our adrenaline was pumping and we were scared to death! after a few minutes we were able to call the fire dept. to report it. i then ran down the street to my home to see if my parents had seen it. unfortunately they didn't. the next day there was an article in the post tribune. two women driving down central avenue (10-15 miles from where we were) had to bring their car to a stop. they described the exact object that we had seen. they stated that it looked like it was going to land in the middle of the street! of course, the city tried to say it was the art hill ford advertising plane. i had seen and heard (extremely loud) that plane on several occasions. there was certainly no confusing that with the object that we had seen.
content.summary: Fluorescent yellow disc with multi colored square lights around the base, hovering just above the tree tops.

content.detailedDescription: We stopped in the parking lot for albertson's and got out of the car. what i heard next sounded kind of like a waving, muffled sound. i at first thought it was a stealth bomber, because of the shape of the object, which was difficult to discern. there were three three white lights that were very still, and there was a blinking light in the center that was white and blue. it was low enough that if i were standing on the roof of the grocery store, i could have almost touched it. it was moving exceptionally slow, almost stationary. i then went into the store for maybe a minute or so, came out, and it was completely gone. to note, right after this, the f-16 fighters from the nearby airforce base (hill) started to fly into the sky in the general direction of where the object was.
content.summary: Ufo over albertson's in clearfield, ut

content.detailedDescription:
On march the eighth i was driving from between smithville, ar to cherokee village, ar and was going towards imboden at around 9:30 pm on hwy 115. i turned a corner and saw the object hovering at what was just a little above my eyeline. 

i guess i just slammed on my breaks and my car died (i have a standard, so i might not have pressed the clutch. i don't remember if i did or not) and couldn't do anything but stare at it. to say i was shocked is an understatement. i was also a little scared, but also a little in awe of it. it had lights around the edges that showed it to be triangle like.  i think it was only a couple of minutes that it hovered before moving to my left, then turning sharply and shooting upwards and disapeared.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saw a triangle shaped craft hovering, then went forward, turned 90 degrees and shot upwards

content.detailedDescription:
Hello,

i want you guys to know that i see these ufo's all the time 
they usually appear when i look up in the sky (i'm not joking)
i'ts come to time that i must understand whats going on here

and another thing is that almost everytime i look at the time
i get  digits eg.(12:12) i'm really tuned in to something here
and would like someone to contact me or investigate this.

i also see them around the cemtrails alot.

i'm not stupid and i know there is agency's watching people(even online)
all the time and i welcome them to contact me as well
 i'm not afraid of whats going on because i have been contacted.

thats all i'm saying.


thank you.
content.shape: Diamond,  Egg,  Oval,  Sphere,  Star-like,  Other,  Unknown
content.summary: "i see them all the time"

content.detailedDescription: Going outside to eat breakfast that morning was unexceptional other than the fact that my usual spot to recline by the shaded part of my house and have breakfast proved to be cooler than my liking that day. i slid my spring chair recliner about 15 feet into the warmer sunlight and took a seat. as i did, i was, by coincidence looking straight at a silvery-colored object in the clear blue sky. there was no sound at all coming from it like i would expect given the fact that i am located on the standard flight path of commercial aircraft that usually land at hancock field, syracuse, some twenty five miles away. as i watched it i noticed that as the morning light bounced off the object i could see that the object reflected a curved panel-shaped side that was like polished aluminum and had more of an appearance of a do-nut than a frisbee overall. the object was probably 2000 feet from my position and its' apparant size looked to be the size of the tip of my thumb held at arms length. i sensed no fear or anxiety from the experience as i was torn between running into the house to get my digital camera and returning to take a photo or two and remaining there in the chair looking at the object as i noticed that it was actually moving due west towards our lake 6 tenths of a miles away. i continued my observations uninterrupted for a few more minutes. its position changed from about 10 o'clock to 12 o'clock high overall at which point it simply disappeared in a blink. i recognize the fact that if i positioned my chair in any other place and had not been able to look in the object's exact direction when i sat back in it, the observation of the ufo would have been impossible. when it ended i became aware that i had seen something exceptional. when i first noticed the object i observed it for probably 15 seconds before i began to question whether or not this craft deserved more recognition than the standard aircraft that is so familar to me. once it became clear that my observations were important to my personal curiousity, i never stopped observing it until it vanished as was described in my statement.
content.summary: Object silently floated above in clear skies showing a very slow, but steady movement towards the west, and when it reached about 12 o'clock high suddenly "blinked"out (disappeared).

content.detailedDescription:
(reporting this for witness who doesn't have internet access)
was taking nightly neighborhood walk when he noticed four obol drifting in the nw sky. one of the lights stopped, then added lights (4) in a semi-circle pattern around the main light. after several seconds, the semi-circled lights sequentially winked out l to r. this pattern of one light becoming four lights, then winking out one by one regenerated at least 14 or 15 times, putting on quite a show.  watched them during the entire one hour walk; figured others had to be seeing them as well.  there were at least three, maybe four main lights which would become groups of smaller lights, sometimes alone, sometimes simultaneously w/other lights. they generally moved from the n to sw over northern kokomo - it appeared at least one flew right over bonnaire school.  there was no noise, and nothing conventional made sense. they were not flares from aircraft at nearby grissom afb, either. the lights wouldn't fade out - they were either on, or off, like someone flipping a switch. all the lights, even the smaller ones in the semicircle patterns, were of an orangish color. by the time the walk ended and the witness entered his home, the lights were nearly gone from his view. he came back outside a few minutes later to take out the trash, and the lights were completely gone, after putting on a show which lasted an hour.  witness is a mufon menber, but has not seen any aerial phenomenon in many years.  don't have any idea what the lights were, but pretty sure they were not conventional aircraft, or flares dropped by aircraft.
content.summary: Orange balls of light (obol)

content.detailedDescription: Two of my coworkers and i witnessed a dark doughnut shaped object float and dissapear into the clouds today at about 4pm.  we are located at the intersection of 183 and mopac in a 4 story building on the 2nd floor facing east, it was se of the intersection.  it appeared to be fairly large although it was hard to guage, but it definately wasn't small, it hovered, it almost seemed to be floating and wobbling as it moved up into the clouds over about a 5 or 10 minute period.  the hole was easily seen, it looked like a big dark doughnut.  it didn't seem to be powered or travel with any visible intention or direction, it was moving slowly.  i've never seen anything like it before, i don't know what it was.
content.summary: Doughnut shape object sighted in the sky se of the 183 and mopac intersection.

content.detailedDescription: I work on the railroad as an electrican.(new jersey transit) hoboken new jersey.One night after working the rush hour,i was taking a break looking at the view of new york and staring up at the stars, thinking how beautiful the weather would be tomorrow. it was a clear night. all of a sudden i saw a star(i thought it was a star)break formation from the others and told my co-worker that the star wasnt moving before. he said it probably was a shooting star, and we should get back to work.I told him to wait. we saw it traveling toward the river by the statue of liberty,when all of a sudden it stopped above the water. we could see it shinning for about 20 seconds. then it headed straight down the river as it looked like it would crash into the world trade center. it stopped on a dime and then went straight up.It looked loke a minature sun(fireball).We heard air force jets, looked up and and seen five planes in v formation. we assumed it was chasing the ufo. the next day a small article in the paper read as followstwin towers duck as ufo flies overhead.The paper confirmed that it was a ufo and that 56 witnesses on the new york side of the water saw it also. thankyou v lanza
content.summary: Looked  like a shooting star

content.detailedDescription:
I work for southwest airlines..I was waiting for my next flight to provision.  i was talking to a fellow agent when i looked up to the sky as i was talking and noticed a triangle shaped small object coming from the south...1 light at the head-3 down each side of the triangle..It looked really werid..It was up very high..But i could make out the 7 little lights..Then it turned left (east) and slowly faded away!
it was great to see cause it did'nt look normal in the night sky.
it was up to high to see any detail except the 7 lights.
it looked like something from a video game projected in the night sky.
i kept thinking? what is that?
content.summary: 7 lights-triangle shape-flew over lax airport-about 40,000ft.

content.detailedDescription: It had been pouring rain (in sheets) from fri. afternoon (3-7-08)until saturday night (3-8-08).  when the rain finally stopped @8:15pm saturday, the air warmed up but was still very windy.  the sky though was exceptionally clear, brilliant with dozens of stars.  i couldn't help but enjoy sky-watching in my sister's backyard.  orion was directly above the horizon but not directly above me.  my eyes had fully adjusted to the night sky.  something in my peripheral vision to my right got my attention.  about 7 - 10 very bright, yellowish yet hazy around the edges, teardrop shaped objects flased across the entire sky w to e. they were in random order, a couple of them stopped for a milisecond and then continued on.  they were the shape of a teardrop according to your checklist but my first impression was they looked like tadpoles with wiggly tails (?).  this took my breath away.  i started to rationalize as to what i had just seen. since i was down the shore, i know what spotlights or search beams of light look like coming from lighthouses.  i thought to myself, maybe that's what i saw? i doubted it, but was the only explantion that came to mind.  but within 30 seconds, i caught something out of my peripheral vision again to the right (west).  the same exact lights appeared again, only this time they were in a vee formation, 20 - 30 of them, looking just like the first ones and going just as fast.  they covered the night sky, streaking w to e in formation.  my heart was pounding.  i screamed for my sister. by the time she got to the backyard she missed the sighting.  i was breathless.  and described to her what i had seen.  these objects disappeared to the east (atlantic ocean)horizon.
content.summary: @8:30 pm sky crystal-clear, from w to e across sky - 20-30 blurred (hazy) but bright in vee formation flashed across the entire sky to the east.

content.detailedDescription: Traveling home on my motorcycle after work i took a side road to extend the ride a bit. turned left onto highway 63 heading south from east calvert hill road. as i creasted the first hill i noticed what i believed to be a black bird to my left over the field riding an updraft. i refocused my attention on the rode when in my mind i thought, "that didn't look like a bird." at that point i was parallel with it over the field and i looked at it closer. i noticed that it seemed to move like it was a puppet on a string instead of something using any type of aerodynamics. the movement was erratic. when i looked right at it i could tell it was not a bird, but did not know what it was. again, i am riding down a major highway on a motorcycle at 60-70 mph and let off of the throttle, but did not brake to slow down. i was litterally having a hard time processing what i thought i was seeing. the object was black and somewhat cigar shaped. as i try to remember i believe it had fins similar to a submarine, but i could be trying to asimulate it to something i recognize. the front end was round like a globe. the middle was a bit smaller and the back end was cylindrical. the very end was flat like a flashlight end. i created what my minds eye sees when i try to remember it in the computer software microsoft paint. i drew this a couple of days after the event. i am ex air force and have seen many types of aircraft. this was nothing like any aircraft that i have ever seen. it moved like no other aircraft i have ever seen. as i continued to coast down the highway my mind was racing. i am not sure, but i beleive the object noticed me as well. the front of the object seemed to point in my direction and that is what made me think that it was under intelligent control. at this point i am well past the craft and begin to throttle again. there is no real safe turn around spot on this part of the highway for a motorcycle and so i proceeded on my way. the entire time i am trying to understand why i am not turning around to go back. it was wierd, but i just went on my way home.
content.summary: Noticed black object floating as i was traveling on my motorcycle. it seemed to notice me as well.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside the front of my house at about 07:30pm on thursday 6th march to remove some rubbish sacks when two of my teenage neighbours (approx 13 and 14 years of age) asked me what i thought the strange light movements in sky immediately above us were. it was evening and very dark, and the cloud cover was quite thick, but a light movement coming from behind the clouds was very visible. at first i thought it might be a helicopter, but the movements were so fast and covering such a large distance that i realised that it was highly unlikely to be a normal aircraft of any type that i could think of. the light movements were very repetitive and in a triangular motion, they continued for some 15 minutes in roughly the same area before i decided to go back indoors. during the event, i made some joking remark to my teenage neighbours that it was a aliens, which they both appeared to not want to believe. i've seen this once before several months ago, again witnessed by many other people in roughly the same area.
content.summary: Very bright light moving in a continuous triangular motion behind the clouds at a very high speed

content.detailedDescription:
It���s march 8, 2008 at the time of this writing. after many years, i���ve decided to officially go on record with my story. in 1998, i was 25 years old and working as a production coordinator for a video production company out of new orleans, la.

a couple of times a year, i would travel to louisville, ky to work at conventions and i would drive the company equipment truck, a 15 foot penske cube-type rental truck. i had just finished up a week long convention in louisville and was in the truck, headed home to new orleans, late one spring night. it was around midnight as i drove alone.  i was traveling south on interstate 65 and had made it a couple of hours south of louisville which, i would say put me around bowling green, ky.
in that area, nothing but wide open, rolling cow pastures were on either side, as far as could be seen. i had the window cracked to catch the breeze while i drove.  the radio was off. all was very quiet, just the sound of the wind. i was cruising at about 65 mph in the slow lane as i drove a pretty boring and straight stretch of road. 

then, what i see next out of my peripheral vision is another vehicle coming up to pass me in the left lane. as it breaks ahead and then eases over into my lane, just 2 car lengths in front of my truck, i realize that this was not just another car. it was a craft that was hovering about 4 feet off the ground, at level with my windshield and had assumed a fixed cruising speed with me. i sank back in my chair, jaw hanging to the floor in utter shock at what i was seeing. it was the shape of the typically reported, hat shaped saucer, about the size of a compact car. it was like a yellowish tan color, smooth all over (no visible windows, lights, doors, bolts, handles, creases, etc. that would make it seem man-made) it had a noodily looking thing that reminded me of a parascope, probably about the width and length of an arm, sticking out the top of this craft. i would call this craft slightly metallic, as my headlights gleamed off of it like a finely waxed show car would. but, i would not say that it was glowing or emitting any of its own light. it hovered there in front of me, in that fixed position, for only about 8 seconds. but, believe me, it was plenty of time to get a good look at it. it then proceeded to gradually and smoothly accelerate away from me. in another 10 seconds, i lost sight of it over the next hill. there was only one other car on the highway that i could see,  way up ahead of it as it moved away. i���ve always wondered if that other driver got buzzed as well. needless to say, my adrenaline was through the roof. i then proceeded all the way back to louisiana, an 11 hour trip that was started at 10pm at night after a full day of work, without stopping. normally, i would check in to a hotel at the halfway mark on those trips but, not that night!
content.summary: Buzzed by a ufo on the interstate - bowling green, ky

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Feb. 26 1996 i jumped in a car and headed up the freeway to grand valley college with a friend of mine who was driving west from farmington hills. the sky was dark behind us towards detroit but in front of us the sky was lit from the sun setting in front of us pillow clouds scattered in the sky mainly a clear visible sky. a cloud in the distance begins to blink. we both noticed it and i was asking him if he seen that too and he said yeah. i told him were did it ocme from cause i didnt see it fly there. he said me either he paused and said its a plane. we both new it was to high up to be a tower or something. so we continued to monitor this blinking light that was stationary in a cloud that seemed to move with the blinking light for about 5 to 10 miles. we see this blinking light come out of the cloud, the light wasnt blinking i noticed right away it was spinning around the space craft at a very high speed which made it apear to be blinking when it was behind the cloud was on the bottom of the craft the top half of the craft was silver metalic reflecting color half circular shape but large towards the top. we both are taking back by this sight and are eyes are frozen on this object unable to turn away.We watched this ufo hover without soundfor about another few miles before we heard a rumbling in the sky from the south were a huge pack of fighter jets came rolling in they seemed to be moving real slow like they didnt want any peice of that ship. i now see both the ufo and the jets in the same sky  and the ufo is just swaying back and forth were the jets are in v shape and flying in a str8 line towards it when i noticed the ufo was toying with the jets the jets appeared to slow down as if they didnt want to get to close to the ufo it was like they were just shewing a fly away. the  ufo begins to back up it then sling shots out of the sky out of sight in the blink of an eye. the jets then turn around and head back south. my friend and i begin to see people pulled over on the side of the road pointing at the sky for the next 20 miles. my friend wanted to stop and say we seen it too but i told him to keep driving because i felt really distraut by what i saw and wasnt thinking clearly. since i never stopped on that side of the road to tell the rest of those people i saw it too i decided to find this website and do so here. and how i felt towards the ufo was the weirdest thing it was like it was saying i come in peace and to not be alarmed no one was running in fear or great devastating panic it was like a cool calmness came over me and i was not afraid. since this knowledge is not meant for everyone but only those who truely believe they are real p.S. i hope to see u in 4d.
content.summary: I went  to grand valley college with a freind. blinking light in the sky in front of us behind a cloud. feb 26 1996

content.detailedDescription:
Looking out my patio doors into the bright southern california sky i noticed 3 glowing round objects flying in a triangular formation. at first i thought i was seeing aircraft possibly in a military formation but when i went outside it became clear that these were not any sort of plane or helicopter that i'd ever seen. they changed formation quickly, one of the orbs moving away from the other two. i went into grab my video camera and came back out seconds later but they were gone.

i looked at a lot of video on youtube and this one seems the most like what i saw today. 

http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=e9xc1hwlgdm&feature=related
content.summary: 3 glowing circles

content.detailedDescription:
I was out walking my dogs and i looked up, as i'm near an airport, to see if there were any aircraft in the air.  there were.  i saw 2 passenger jets.  but higher up i saw a light colored object flying.  this object was moving quite rapidly, and it went behind the trees, so i had to change my position to see it.

as best as i could tell it was light colored with a darker center.  the reason i saw it was because sunlight reflected off of it.  after i changed position i saw another object of the same description as well as the first.  

the first object was initially moving in a north by north west trajectory.  the second object was moving as well, but i am not sure of the direction, as i only saw it for a short time.  when both objects neared each other they veered to the north east.

the sky was clear and bright. after observing for approximately 30 seconds,  i lost them in the sun, and i also began to see bright spots reflecting.  it was at that point that i made note of the time:  1515 or 3:15 est.

there was the sound of a jet present, but i do not believe that the objects were making that sound, i believe the passenger jet, or another aircraft from dulles international airport was responsible for that noise.

i was in the marine corps, and am familiar with most types of aircraft.  these craft did not appear to be anything that i have seen before.  it is possible that they were birds-except for the fact that sunlight glinted off of the first object, which is what drew my attention in the first place.
content.summary: Two diamond shaped objects

content.detailedDescription:
i go to bed quite late and was still up.  i looked out my dining room window (towards the west) at exactly 11:40pm, on june 1, 2007, and saw a very large object which was an oval shape except that the bottom was straight across.  it was a brilliant white, with very bright white light eminating from the middle of the oval similar to a strobe light. we have canadian and coast guard helicopters fly by here regularly and this object was higher than their flight path but lower that the military and commercial  airplanes usually fly. 
  it was very large in comparison to the helicopters we see, i estimate it was at least three helicopters by 6 helicopters in size (i can't estimate by feet).
  when i saw it, it was hovering in the air and i watched it there for several minutes.  i heard my husband get up and called for him to come and look at it.  right before he got to the window, i looked at him and when i looked back it was gone.
  about three weeks before that i had seen a very bright light above the tree line but at a greater distance.  it was larger and brighter than the stars or the space station, which i have seen.  neither one appeared to be a durigable of any kind.
  i have finally decided to report this as i am sure that others must have seen this object because we are close to the international bridge between here and sault ste marie, ontario.
   no one that i know here, heard anything about others seeing it, but i try to keep an open mind about ufo's.
content.summary: Large oval with brilliant pulsing, strobe like, white light emindating from center in all directions.

content.detailedDescription: As i was getting out of my car to open up the daycare that i work at, i happened to look up when i saw a silent star like object fly from the southwest toward where i was standing.I first thought it was a satellite because it was silent.I ruled out an aircraft because there was no sound.As my daughter and i watched, the object seemed to veer toward us for a few seconds.It continued toward the east out of view.I'am a private pilot and judged the object to be maybe a few thousand feet or higher.Everything that i've seen in this area has had a sound or was clearly a satellite or aircraft but i thought this was too low to be a satellite and the morning sun was coming up over the east which made the sky partially lit.I thought it was unusual that the light was so bright with no sound.Both my daughter and i watched for a few minutes before it was time to open up the center.My feeling was calm i was not alarmed in anyway,although my daughter got a little nervous.
content.summary: Silent satellite like light was seen flying west to east.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to my parents house in which they live about 2 minutes from my home.  i saw a brilliant bright white light in the distance.  as i drove for about 1/2 mile the object was hovering above the tree line not moving or moving very slowly.  as i stopped at the stop light at deale-churchton rd, the vehicle in back of me almost crashed into me, when i looked backed the man had his head out of his car looking at the same object i was looking at.   when the light turned green we both took a left and drove no more than 1 mi an hour watching the object.  at this time the object slowly flew over the road we were driving on with no sound whats so ever.  after the object flew over us and disappeared we continued driving on.  after stopping at my parents house and explaining what just happened, we were all in amazement.  i then left their house and arrived back to my home.  i went upstairs to my bedroom to go to bed.  i have a sliding glass door in my master bedroom in which looks over shady side and the tree line towards churchton, where my parents live.  i looked outside and in the distance i saw the same object hovering over the tree line almost in the same area where i originally saw it.  i watched the object hover for about 5 minutes more and it started to descend into the tree line and disappeared.  it was like nothing i had ever seen.  after this happened, the following sunday 2/24/08 i was awakened by a bad dream about 1:00am, i shot up out of my bed and looked out the window, and there it was again.  i know i wasn't going crazy, so i ran downstairs where my fiance was watching tv and told him it was outside again.  we both ran outside and he got to see it for himself.  we watched it for about 10 minutes and it descended into the tree line like the last time and disappeared.
content.summary: Silent square shape object moving slowly in the shady side area with four brilliant white lights on all four corners.
